ooc: Robo rick let me use Kitkat and Drillbit until he's come back 
next Sunday.

Ic:

"What ?" said Kitkat surpriced when she heard the voice and she 
smelled Silverscout's scent ans she asked to Silverscout too "Who're 
you ?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Silver Scout continues following the scent to where Kit Kat2 is. 
Curiosity had once again gotten the best of her, transforming to wolf 
activated her ability to bend light allowing her to move invisably 
through the halls. she lay down on her four legs and worked her way 
closer to her donor. "Who are you?" she asked knowing hat even though 
Kit Kat couldn't see her she could still be smelled.
